definition: to seek survival/to possess the will to live
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to seek life in death (idiom); to fight for one's life
the will to live

sentences.english: In a last ditch effort at survival, they became cannibals.
sentences.chinese: 爲了求生而最後一搏，他們成爲食人族。

sentences.english: I have this right mindfulness, said Tathagata name, Lime Road, survive the Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 我今正念，稱如來名，爲菩提道，求生淨土。

sentences.english: A drowing man will catch at a straw .
sentences.chinese: 溺者求生心最切，一根稻草也要抓。

sentences.english: Otherwise, as Dylan says, if you're not busy being born, you're busy dying.
sentences.chinese: 否則，就如迪倫所說，不忙於求生，就是在找死。

sentences.english: Neither the state nor the school taught me life-saving or rescue techniques.
sentences.chinese: 無論國家還是學校都沒有教我求生和自救的技巧。

sentences.english: From then on, without backer, the cirrus had to creep on ground and struggle for life.
sentences.chinese: 從此，藤蔓再無依恃，只能匍匐在地上苦苦掙扎求生。

sentences.english: Despite his terrible injuries, he wouldn't give up the struggle for life.
sentences.chinese: 他儘管身負重傷，但仍然沒有放棄求生的努力。

sentences.english: But you cannot maintain that survival mentality forever.
sentences.chinese: 不過，你不能永遠保持這種苟且求生的心態。

sentences.english: They aligned themselves with one side, or got ground between millstones.
sentences.chinese: 他們必須與一方結盟，或在夾縫中求生。

sentences.english: Many small firms operate under the radar of officialdom, dodging taxes and ignoring rules to survive.
sentences.chinese: 很多小公司，在逃稅和違規中求生存。

sentences.english: Shuo rich people in the pursuit of high-tech at the same time the quality of survival.
sentences.chinese: 富碩人在追求高科技的同時以質量求生存。

sentences.english: She sensed he was giving up.
sentences.chinese: 她覺察到他正在放棄求生。

sentences.english: Fashion novel of survival, quality reputation for integrity, mutual benefit for win-win situation.
sentences.chinese: 時尚新穎求生存，質量誠信求信譽，互惠雙贏求效益。

definition: survival/the struggle to eke out a living/to seek for continued existence
to exist/to survive
to survive/to keep on living
the will to live
life/to survive/to save a life/to scrape a living
to fight with all one has
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to flee/to go into exile (from prison)
desperate straits
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
to escape/to flee/to run for one's life
nine deaths and still alive (idiom); a narrow escape/new lease of life
critical circumstances/risky conditions/danger zone

place sb on a field of death and he will fight to live (idiom based on Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to fight desperately when confronting mortal danger/fig. to find a way out of an impasse
pinyin: zhi4 zhi1 si3 di4 er2 hou4 sheng1

definition: danger spot/Jedi (in Star Wars)
